languages.text: "Тенью твоей, следующей в отдалении, и щитом незримым останусь до той поры, пока Неумирающий не протянет ко мне длань. Тогда я окончу служение в чертогах жизни, чтобы продолжить его в посмертии".
languages.translation_comment:
кибелла анрекрутится, все личные квесты ломаются, романс ломается
Выход

кибелла анрекрутится, все личные квесты ломаются, романс ломается
Выход

languages.text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."
languages.original_text: "Тенью твоей, следующей в отдалении, и щитом незримым останусь до той поры, пока Неумирающий не протянет ко мне длань. Тогда я окончу служение в чертогах жизни, чтобы продолжить его в посмертии".

traits.locale_text: "I will remain your unseen shield and distant shadow until the time when the Undying Emperor reaches out His hand to me. Then will my service in the halls of life come to an end, only to continue in the beyond."

"I will remain your unseen shield and distant shadow until the time when the Undying Emperor reaches out His hand to me. Then will my service in the halls of life come to an end, only to continue in the beyond."

"Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

"Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

"Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

languages.text: «Aunque haya de servir en la lejanía, seguiré siendo su escudo y su sombra invisible hasta que el Emperador Inmortal me reclame. Entonces mi tiempo en las estancias de los vivos habrá llegado a su fin, y le serviré en el más allá».
languages.original_text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque haya de servir en la lejanía, seguiré siendo su escudo y su sombra invisible hasta que el Emperador Inmortal me reclame. Entonces mi tiempo en las estancias de los vivos habrá llegado a su fin, y le serviré en el más allá».

languages.text: 「私は離れた場所から仕えなければならないけれど、不死の皇帝が私を御許に呼び寄せるまで、私なあなたの見えざる盾であり、影であり続ける。そうすれば、人生の殿堂での私の時間は終わりをつげ、あちら側で主に使えることになるの」
languages.original_text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

traits.locale_text: 「私は離れた場所から仕えなければならないけれど、不死の皇帝が私を御許に呼び寄せるまで、私なあなたの見えざる盾であり、影であり続ける。そうすれば、人生の殿堂での私の時間は終わりをつげ、あちら側で主に使えることになるの」

languages.text: “虽然我只能在远处侍奉你，但我始终都会是你看不见的坚盾与影子，直到不死帝皇召唤我为止。到了那个时候，我在生命圣殿中的时光就结束了，我会在来世继续侍奉祂。”
languages.original_text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

traits.locale_text: “虽然我只能在远处侍奉你，但我始终都会是你看不见的坚盾与影子，直到不死帝皇召唤我为止。到了那个时候，我在生命圣殿中的时光就结束了，我会在来世继续侍奉祂。”

languages.text: "Ich muss zwar aus der Entfernung dienen, aber ich bleibe Euer Schild und Schatten, ungesehen, bis der Todlose mich zu sich ruft. Dann geht meine Zeit in den Hallen des Lebens zu Ende, und ich werde Ihm im Jenseits dienen."
languages.original_text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss zwar aus der Entfernung dienen, aber ich bleibe Euer Schild und Schatten, ungesehen, bis der Todlose mich zu sich ruft. Dann geht meine Zeit in den Hallen des Lebens zu Ende, und ich werde Ihm im Jenseits dienen."

languages.text: « Bien qu'il me faille vous servir à distance, je resterai votre bouclier et votre ombre invisibles jusqu'à ce que l'Immortel me rappelle à Lui. Alors, mon séjour dans les couloirs de la vie prendra fin, et je Le servirai dans l'au-delà. »
languages.original_text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

traits.locale_text: « Bien qu'il me faille vous servir à distance, je resterai votre bouclier et votre ombre invisibles jusqu'à ce que l'Immortel me rappelle à Lui. Alors, mon séjour dans les couloirs de la vie prendra fin, et je Le servirai dans l'au-delà. »

languages.original_text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."

languages.text: "Uzaktan hizmet etmek zorunda kalsam da Ölmeyen İmparator beni yanına çağırana dek gözle görülmeyen kalkanın ve gölgen olmayı sürdüreceğim. Hayatın salonlarındaki sürem dolduğunda da ötesinde O'na hizmet edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Though I must serve from a distance, I will remain your unseen shield and shadow until the Undying Emperor calls me to Him. Then my time in the halls of life will come to an end, and I will serve Him in the beyond."
